column4: I have a question pertaining to Sound Driver in teamspeak.  When I use OSS in teamspeak (only one that seems to work) I lose audo in everything else.  Anyway to assign Teamspeak to an alternitive driver that wont take over my other sounds or game sounds?
that sounds like a problem with oss, rather than with your driver i'm not sure how to help though.
it does this samething on my other computer
is there an alternate driver I can point teamspeak to?
